item.title: Insomnihack 2018 CTF Writeup
item.description: Introduction I had the chance to participate in the Insomni’hack 2018 CTF challenge held in Geneva with 3 friends on Friday, 23rd of March. The team was composed of 4 friends, forming a perfect team of newbies. We managed to get 2 flags in this contest and had partial solutions for some other tasks. Solved challenges vba01-baby - warmup PHuck - php Challenges we spent some time on but did not solve vba02-bitminer - web Authentication service - web backdoor - web, osint guessflag - pwn Spoke - network Some others… vba-01 - Baby We get an Excel file which surely contains macros, so we open it using Excel’s “Protected mode” in a Windows VM:

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Hi! I am ast3ro. This is my blog: $ whoami ast3ro There’s no place like home: $ wheris ast3ro ~/ My background: $ history learn code hack My .plan: $ cat ~/.plan ----------------------------------------- ast3ro's .plan ----------------------------------------- * setup this blog * learn things * hack things * play CTFs
